title: 48. The Business of Hospitality, Boundaries, Retailing + Communication in the Treatment Room with Glow Skincare's Kasey + Hailey.
description:
Hi Roomies,

In this episode I'm BACK with my fav dynamic sister duo, Kasey + Hailey of Glow Skincare LA and Skin And the City!

These two are the queens of hospitality + personalizing the spa business. In this episode, we are talking about:

+ Social media comparison

+ How to stop being awkward in the treatment room and cultivate client relationships

+ How to lead in the treatment room

+ Selling product

+ Tips for someone starting a page now

+ Why overthinking leads to social media paralysis and you need to just POST IT

Connect with Glow Skincare on Instagram: @glowskincarela
